title: What were the Wimbledon results?
description: Top seed Jannik Sinner and seven-time Wimbledon champion Novak Djokovic both advanced on Wednesday, setting a blockbuster semi-final clash at the grass-court major. excerpt: Jannik Sinner and Novak Djokovic advanced to the Wimbledon semi-finals on Wednesday.

html:
Wimbledon

Sinner, Djokovic set SF showdown

July 09, 2025

Ezra Shaw/Getty Images

Wimbledon main-draw action runs until 13 July. By ATP Staff

Top seed Jannik Sinner and seven-time Wimbledon champion Novak Djokovic both advanced on Wednesday, setting a blockbuster semi-final clash at the grass-court major.

View Wednesday's featured results from the All England Club below and click here to see all scores.

Centre Court
Belinda Bencic (SUI) def. [7] Mirra Andreeva 7-6(3), 7-6(2)
[6] Novak Djokovic (SRB) def. [22] Flavio Cobolli (ITA) 6-7(8), 6-2, 7-5, 6-4

No. 1 Court
[8] Iga Swiatek (POL) def. [19] Liudmila Samsonova 6-2, 7-5
[1] Jannik Sinner (ITA) def. [10] Ben Shelton (USA) 7-6(2), 6-4, 6-4

Read More from Wimbledon:
 Djokovic on 'nasty fall': 'The real impact I will feel tomorrow'
Sinner: I was always going to play, just unsure at what level…
Shelton on Sinner: 'Never seen anything like it'
